name: glance
description: Glance is a dynamic homepage and dashboard builder for self-hosted setups. It allows users to display widgets for services, schedules, weather, or links, all configured via simple YAML files.
features: Dynamic Homepage: Build customizable homepages with real-time data from various services.
Widget System: Display weather, calendars, RSS feeds, bookmarks, and service status in modular widgets.
YAML Configuration: Define your entire dashboard layout through simple, readable YAML files.
Service Integration: Connect to self-hosted services and external APIs for live data display.
Responsive Design: Automatically adapts to different screen sizes for desktop and mobile viewing.
Minimal Setup: Quick deployment with sensible defaults and easy customization.
Theme Support: Customize colors and appearance to match your preferences.
Lightweight Performance: Fast loading and minimal resource usage for always-on dashboard displays.
